mapper.sql: uid, phone, password, bname, name, email, avatar, gender, wx, say, securitypwd, securityquestion, securityanswer, registtime
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from sp_member
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sp_member (uid, phone, password, bname, name, email, avatar, gender, wx, say, securitypwd, securityquestion, securityanswer, registtime) values (#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{say,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{securitypwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{securityquestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{securityanswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registtime,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into sp_member
uid,
phone,
password,
bname,
name,
email,
avatar,
gender,
wx,
say,
securitypwd,
securityquestion,
securityanswer,
registtime,

mapper.update:
update sp_member
uid = #{record.uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone = #{record.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bname = #{record.bname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
avatar = #{record.avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{record.gender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wx = #{record.wx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
say = #{record.say,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
securitypwd = #{record.securitypwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
securityquestion = #{record.securityquestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
securityanswer = #{record.securityanswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
registtime = #{record.registtime,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update sp_member set uid = #{record.uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{record.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bname = #{record.bname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar = #{record.avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{record.gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wx = #{record.wx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, say = #{record.say,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, securitypwd = #{record.securitypwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, securityquestion = #{record.securityquestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, securityanswer = #{record.securityanswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registtime = #{record.registtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sp_member
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bname = #{bname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wx = #{wx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
say = #{say,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
securitypwd = #{securitypwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
securityquestion = #{securityquestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
securityanswer = #{securityanswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
registtime = #{registtime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sp_member set phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bname = #{bname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wx = #{wx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, say = #{say,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, securitypwd = #{securitypwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, securityquestion = #{securityquestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, securityanswer = #{securityanswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registtime = #{registtime,jdbcType=INTEGER} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select sm.bname,sm.phone from sp_member sm join sp_lock_admin sla on sm.uid = sla.adminid where sla.locksn =#{sla.locksn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT sm.avatar, sm.gender, smr.userrelation FROM sp_member sm JOIN sp_member_relation smr ON sm.phone = smr.phone WHERE sm.uid = #{sm.uid,jdbcType=INTEGER};
